decision_conditions: The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
G1 - Scots pine x 2	
Reduce in height by approx 3-4m and laterally by approx 2.5m. Current height 21m. Proposed height 17m. Current width 8m. Proposed width 5.5m.
T3 - Leyland Cypress	
Reduce in height by approx 2m and trim front and sides to create a tight and tidy shape. Current height 7m. Proposed height 5m. Current width 6m. Proposed width 5m.
